message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to make a competitive offer. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $12,000. This is a great price, considering the value it will bring to your business.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but $12,000 is a bit too high for my budget. Could you do $9,000?

Hi Bob, I understand that $12,000 is a bit steep for you, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer you the product for $11,000. This is a fair price considering the value it will bring to your business. I'm confident you'll find it worth the investment.
I appreciate you meeting me halfway, Alice. However, I'm still aiming for a price closer to my initial offer. Would you be willing to consider $10,000?

Hi Bob, I understand you're looking for a price closer to your initial offer, but I'm not willing to go all the way down to $10,000. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer you the product for $11,500. This is as low as I can go, considering the product's value to me.
